originalText.text: I am truly grateful for the friendly, accommodating service & Tee’s expertise with Pilates equipment.  He is incredibly knowledgeable, very supportive of my unique situation and being a Pilates teacher, he truly understands how proper equipment function as well as, safety of the equipment for clients.  He was able to provide a virtual equipment assessment (I am based in Canada) followed by a thorough and detailed report of how unsafe and defective my brand new equipment was.  Thanks to his report, Visa reversed my charges and I can now order proper equipment from a more reputable company.  I will definitely reach out to Tee and his team with all my equipment needs going forward.  Thank you so much, I appreciate all you have done for me & my business! :)

originalText.text: I am a new studio owner and recently connected with PPM. I had just acquired a gently used reformer and wanted them to give it a maintenance check. In just a few days we had an appointment scheduled and completed. They are helping me with a few more projects and installations coming up. I feel confident in the upkeep of my studio with their eyes and expertise on my gear. Thanks again!

originalText.text: I highly recommend Pilates Pro Maintenance for their expertise in equipment servicing, their professional communication and their reasonable rates. They are not only well versed in various equipment manufacturers, but they are also Pilates instructors and studio owners which gives them a unique advantage. They have helped me identify, purchase and install apparatus/springs/etc. This is my third time hiring a maintenance company to service my studio and now, my last. I am a very satisfied customer!

originalText.text: The Pilates Pro Maintenance team is the best!! Super professional, knowledgeable, expert and very cool!! They have a positive spirit, freely share excellent information and honor the traditional Pilates system. I highly recommend Pilates Pro Maintenance for everyone!!

text.text: The Pilates Pro Maintenance team is the best!! Super professional, knowledgeable, expert and very cool!! They have a positive spirit, freely share excellent information and honor the traditional Pilates system. I highly recommend Pilates Pro Maintenance for everyone!!

originalText.text: We are undergoing a reupholstery of all 6 of our reformers and with our very first one back we are SO impressed with the quality of the work! It looks brand spanking new thanks to Tee’s talent and the turnaround time with them was a matter of days. It’s a life saver having them!!
